dcterms:creator: A. Joshi
A. Prabhu
M. Shrivastava
V. Varma
dcterms:description: A dataset for sentiment analysis of Hi-En code-mixed data containing user comments from public Facebook pages of Salman Khan and Narendra Modi. It includes 3879 sentences, categorized into 15% negative, 50% neutral, and 35% positive classes.
dcterms:title: Hi-En Code-Mixed Dataset
